column2: Barrick to partner with Ma'aden on Saudi Arabian copper asset TORONTO
column3: July 13 Barrick Gold said on Sunday it is forming a joint venture with Saudi Arabian Mining Co  (Ma'aden) to run its Jabal Sayid copper asset in the kingdom
column4: a move that could see the long-delayed mine finally begin production in late 2015.

column2: Journeyman Harman leads by one at John Deere Classic Brian Harman hit almost every fairway and green to shoot six-under-par 65 and lead fellow American Steve Stricker by one stroke after the third round at the John Deere Classic in Silvis
